#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

long long int func(long long int *a,long long int *b,int n,int d)
{
long long int diff=1000000000000000000LL,pos=0;
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
{
long long int temp=d-a[i];
if(temp==0)
{
if(a[i]<diff)
{
diff=a[i];
pos=i+1;
}
continue;
}
if(temp<0)
{
if(d<diff)
{
diff=d;
pos=i+1;
}
continue;
}
if(temp%(a[i]-b[i])==0)
temp=a[i]+(temp/(a[i]-b[i]))*(a[i]+b[i]);
else
temp=(temp/(a[i]-b[i])+1)*(a[i]+b[i])+d-(temp/(a[i]-b[i])+1)*(a[i]-b[i]);
if(temp<diff)
{
diff=temp;
pos=i+1;
}
//cout<<temp<<" "<<i<<endl;
}
return pos;
}
int main()
{
ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
int n;
cin>>n;
long long int a[n],b[n];
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
cin>>a[i];
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
cin>>b[i];
long long int d;
cin>>d;
cout<<func(a,b,n,d)<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
